FS440
Statute Caselaw
2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010

CHAPTER 440 (2010)
SECTION 03

440.03 Application.

Every employer and employee as defined in s. 440.02 shall be bound by the provisions of this chapter.

s. 3, ch. 17481, 1935; CGL 1936 Supp. 5966(3); s. 1, ch. 70-148; s. 23, ch. 78-300; s. 124, ch. 79-40; s. 21, ch. 79-312; s. 43, ch. 89-289; s. 56, ch. 90-201; s. 52, ch. 91-1.
